title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4208.13 - When hearing held
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4208.13 - When hearing held

State Regulations

Whenever a matter has been referred to the commission by
a steward or judges which involves an alleged violation by any person of any
law or of any section of the rules and regulations or an order or directive of
the commission, or whenever the commission, on its own initiative, shall
determine to take cognizance of any such alleged violation or any other matter
within its jurisdiction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4208.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
